page.page-title: Infrastructure Group for the OpenMath Website
page.p: The OpenMath website is maintained by a team of people called the infrastructure group which takes care of polishing it.
This group is coordinated by the infrastructure mailing-list
Current members include: Paul Libbrecht, Christoph Lange, Urs Holzer, Constantin Jucovschi, Jan Willem Knopper and David Carlisle.
